{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = TP-Link Archer C5 v1.x 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.tp-link.com/en/home-networking/wifi-router/archer-c5/#qrcode |sp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/download/Archer-C5_V1.20.html |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_Archer_C5_v1.x |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer C5 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.20 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/06/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_Archer_C5_v1.x |wlclass = AC1200 |series = Archer C5 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7C5 |icid = 8853A-C5 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9558; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 720 <!-- 720 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FV; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327N; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 1C:FA:68,EC:26:CA |oui = 1C:FA:68,EC:26:CA
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;ap135; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, JP4
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 241JW, 1341 MY;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^TP-LINK_2.4GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$,,, ^TP-LINK_5GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt,
|availability = End of Life |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/14/2014 |estreldate = 06/25/2014 |estprice = 60 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- B00FYLMNUK ?? --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Qualcomm Atheros CUS223 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"2050500332" is silkscreened on the main board in the [https://fccid.io/TE7C5/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-2322724 FCC photos]. *"2052500400" is silkscreened on the back of the wireless module. *"2050500351" is silkscreened on the main board in the users photos.
==Links of Interest== [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/archer-c5-c7-wdr7500 ''TP-LINK Archer C5/C7'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32651-ac1200-router-roundup-part-1?showall=&start=3 On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"The only difference between the C5 v1 and C7 v1 is the 5GHz maximum :link rate is limited to 867Mbps on the C5 vs. 1300 Mbps on the C7. :The 2.4 GHz radio link rate isn't capped, so it will link at 217/450Mbps :(20/40MHz bandwidth) when used with a 3x3 2.4 GHz client." *[http://www.profesionalreview.com/2014/08/27/review-tp-link-archer-c5/ On '''ProfesionalReview'''] (in Spanish, photos of board) :The unit appears to be identical to the [[TP-LINK Archer C7 v2.x]] :([http://forum.tp-link.com/showthread.php?80222-Archer-V1.2-VS-V2 Archer C5 V1.2 vs V2], [http://blog.naver.com/ckdalsdk12/40208033303 internal photos ''Archer C7 v2''])

Please insert instructions here
